post:
I have some space, thought I would do a promo :)


This promotion applies to any 2GB, 3GB, 4GB or 8GB VPS on a _**semi annual or annual**_ basis.

Promotion code: **ssdkvm2020**

Plans below listed with double disk, open a ticket to choose double disk or 2nd IP after payment.

| **vCPU**      | **RAM**        | **DISK**   | **6 Months** | **yearly** | **Order Link**
|-------------------|--------------------|----------------------|------------|-------------|------------|
| 2 x E31270v6 | 2GB DDR4 | 30GB  | €15 |€30 | [ORDER](https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=185 "ORDER")
| 2 x E31270v6 | 3GB DDR4 | 40GB  | €22.50 | €45  | [ORDER](https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=186 "ORDER")
| 2 x E31270v6 | 4GB DDR4 | 50GB  | €30  | €60 | [ORDER](https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=187 "ORDER")

<hr />

All UK SSD KVM plans benefit from:

* Free Direct Admin licenses.
* Free DDOS protection
* @Clouvider 's excellent network
* Daily full virtual disk image backup to a separate local raid array (DR Only)

General Terms:

1. No tor
2. No torrenting
3. CPU abuse policy is the very first thing in the terms, it is enforced when it impacts others.
4. 48 hour refund window for promos, applies to your first service only.
5. No open proxies.
6. No bulk mail
7. Any support is offered is free and low priority unless a paid support add-on is taken (optional)
8. Outside of DR situations (full node) restores are charged at €10 and completed within 24 hours.
9. Your data is called 'your data' for a reason, look after it!
